conversations.description: Homeowner provides address and wants a full kitchen remodel; assistant gathers location, code constraints, material costs, and contractor bids.
User wants to add a second-story bedroom; assistant checks zoning permits, calculates required stair dimensions, and produces a budget.
Client asks for an energy‑efficient bathroom renovation; assistant pulls local code for water‑saving fixtures and compares material prices.
Homeowner wants to replace old windows with double‑pane; assistant finds window codes, gets regional glass pricing, and schedules installation.
User plans a backyard deck extension; assistant reviews setback requirements, sources lumber costs, and obtains contractor timelines.
Family intends to convert a garage into a rental unit; assistant extracts fire‑rating rules, material estimates, and rental‑market‑adjusted budget.
Customer desires a home office with soundproofing; assistant fetches acoustic code limits, material costs for panels, and a phased schedule.
Homeowner wants to install a solar panel array; assistant checks local electrical code, gets panel pricing, and compares installer bids.
User wants to remodel a historic Victorian front porch; assistant pulls preservation guidelines, specialty material costs, and skilled contractor offers.
Client requests a universal‑design kitchen; assistant identifies ADA compliance requirements, material options, and budget with contingency.
Homeowner is budgeting for a new stone fireplace; assistant gathers masonry code, stone material pricing, and contractor quotations.
User wants to replace the roof with metal shingles; assistant looks up wind‑load code, regional metal pricing, and fast‑track contractor availability.
Family plans a basement finishing project; assistant extracts egress window codes, calculates drywall and insulation costs, and provides a schedule.
Homeowner asks for a pet‑friendly laundry room remodel; assistant checks waterproofing code, material costs for epoxy flooring, and bid options.
User wants a smart‑home lighting upgrade; assistant reviews electrical code for low‑voltage systems, compares LED fixture prices, and gives a timeline.
Customer wants to add a skylight to the master bedroom; assistant verifies roof cut‑out code, material pricing, and contractor lead times.
Homeowner seeks to replace old plumbing with PEX; assistant pulls local plumbing code, material costs, and bid comparisons for licensed plumbers.
User wants a small ADU (Accessory Dwelling Unit); assistant checks zoning allowances, material and labor costs, and phased construction schedule.
Family needs a wheelchair‑accessible bathroom; assistant extracts barrier‑free code, material options, and cost estimate with contingency.
Homeowner wants to update exterior siding to fiber‑cement; assistant gathers fire‑rating code, regional material prices, and contractor bids.
User is planning a home theater room; assistant reviews acoustic code, material costs for sound‑proofing, and timeline for installation.
Customer wants to replace an outdated HVAC system; assistant checks energy code compliance, pricing for units, and bids from licensed installers.
Homeowner wants to install a home gym with reinforced flooring; assistant pulls floor‑load code, material costs for rubber mats, and contractor options.
User asks for a modern farmhouse style kitchen; assistant gathers code for countertop overhangs, material pricing for shiplap, and budget breakdown.
Family wants to convert attic space into a nursery; assistant reviews egress and insulation code, material costs, and phased schedule.
Homeowner seeks to replace interior doors with sliding barn doors; assistant checks fire‑rating code, material costs, and contractor availability.
User wants a rain‑water harvesting system; assistant extracts plumbing code for rain barrels, material pricing, and installation bids.
Customer plans a front‑yard landscaping renovation; assistant reviews grading code, material costs for native plants, and schedule for crews.
Homeowner requests a home office addition with built‑in bookshelves; assistant fetches fire‑resistance code for wood, material pricing, and bid options.
User wants to upgrade the main entrance with a new door and porch lights; assistant checks accessibility code, material costs, and contractor timeline.
Family needs a new garage door with insulation; assistant verifies wind‑load code, material pricing for insulated doors, and bid comparisons.
Homeowner wants to add a small guest cottage; assistant pulls zoning setbacks, material costs for modular units, and contractor schedule.
User is renovating a outdated pantry into a walk‑in; assistant extracts code for ventilation, material costs for shelving, and timeline.
Customer desires a backyard fire pit with stone veneer; assistant gathers fire‑safety code, material pricing, and bids for masonry work.
Homeowner plans to install a central vacuum system; assistant checks building code for ductwork, material costs, and contractor availability.
User wants to replace carpet with hardwood floors throughout; assistant reviews code for subfloor prep, material costs, and phased installation schedule.
Family wants to add a utility room for laundry and storage; assistant pulls code for utility connections, material pricing, and contractor bids.
Homeowner is interested in a home addition for a playroom; assistant extracts code for ceiling height, material costs for framing, and timeline.
User wants to reconfigure the layout of a small apartment; assistant gathers code for load‑bearing walls, material costs for partitions, and contractor schedule.
Customer wants a low‑maintenance patio with stamped concrete; assistant checks drainage code, material pricing, and contractor bid.
Homeowner seeks to upgrade exterior lighting to LED with motion sensors; assistant verifies electrical code, material costs, and installation timeline.
User plans a minimalist bathroom remodel with floating vanity; assistant extracts code for vanity clearance, material costs, and bid options.
Family wants to install a home elevator; assistant pulls building code for shafts, high‑cost material pricing, and specialized contractor bids.
Homeowner wants to add a covered front porch; assistant checks code for roof overhangs, material costs for lumber and roofing, and schedule.
User wants a complete interior repaint with low‑VOC paints; assistant reviews indoor air quality code, material pricing, and contractor availability.
Customer needs a new frost‑protected plumbing system for a cold climate; assistant extracts relevant code, material costs for insulation, and bids.
Homeowner wants to replace a load‑bearing beam with a steel joist; assistant pulls structural code, material costs for steel, and specialized contractor schedule.
User plans a backyard pool install; assistant gathers safety code for fences, material pricing for pool liner, and multiple contractor bids.
Family wants to install a central vacuum system with in‑wall dust collection; assistant checks code for vent placement, material costs, and schedule.
Homeowner wants to add a built‑in wine cellar; assistant extracts code for humidity control, material costs for stone walls, and contractor timeline.
